extension.name: UUID Field
extension.description: A field for Symphony CMS that generates UUID values upon saving.

releases.release: - Added paragonie/random_compat (at < 9.99) library to composer.json. Ensures PHP 5.6.x support for the ramsey/uuid package. - Added isUnique() method in field class. - Removed all code relating to auto_generate. Now always required and auto generates. - New entries will see the UUID field pre-populated. - Field in publish forms is disabled.
